ana šarri bēlīya urdaka Adad-isseʾa lū šulmu ana šarri bēlīya ūmu ša emūqī x x ša Urarṭaya x x x x x Aza x x x x x x x e-ta-x+x x x x x x x ana {LU₂}x x x x x x x ni-x x x x x x x x x i-tal-x x x x x x x i-tu-x+x x x x x x x ittalak x x x x x x mā atâ x x x x x kusāpī lā x x x x x nāgir ēkalli x+x x x x x mā Urarṭaya x x x x x issi x x x+x x x x x x {LU₂}x x x 07 x x x x x rēhāti x+x x x x x x mā ša x x x x x x x x x x x sartenni mā išši x x x x x x+x kurru
